channel.title: CVE Feed for Thales -- Sentinel HASP LDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Thales -- Sentinel HASP LDK

item.title: CVE-2024-0197|2024-08-09T15:26:44.274Z -- thales -- sentinel%20hasp%20ldk
item.description: A flaw in the installer for Thales SafeNet Sentinel HASP LDK prior to 9.16 on Windows allows an attacker to escalate their privilege level via local access.
